article_title: Why Wall Street Loves (And Scalia Hates) The Obamacare Decision

article_metadata.description: The Supreme Court has saved Obamacare again, led by Chief Justice John Roberts. And Wall Street is loving the decision.
article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond
